runtime_defaults.name: Active Hours Enabled
runtime_defaults.description: Enable the active hours sleep window feature

settings.name: Secondary Face Index
settings.description: Determines what face to go to from the first face on long press of the Mode button. Also excludes these faces from the normal rotation. In the default firmware, this lets you access temperature and battery voltage with a long press of Mode. Some folks also like to use this to hide the preferences and time set faces from the normal rotation. If you don't want any faces to be excluded, set this to 0 and a long Mode press will have no effect.

settings.name: Signal Tune
settings.description: Custom hourly chime tune. Check movement_custom_signal_tunes.h for options.

settings.name: Red Color
settings.description: Determines the intensity of the led colors Set a hex value 0-15 with 0x0 being off and 0xF being max intensity

settings.name: 24h Mode
settings.description: Set to true for 24h mode or false for 12h mode

settings.name: Button Sound
settings.description: Enable or disable the sound on mode button press

settings.name: Timeout Interval
settings.description: Set the timeout before switching back to the main watch face Valid values are: 0: 60 seconds 1: 2 minutes 2: 5 minutes 3: 30 minutes

settings.name: Low Energy Interval
settings.description: Set the timeout before switching to low energy mode Valid values are: 0: Never 1: 10 minutes 2: 1 hour 3: 2 hours 4: 6 hours 5: 12 hours 6: 1 day 7: 7 days

settings.name: Led Duration
settings.description: Set the led duration Valid values are: 0: No LED 1: 1 second 2: 3 seconds 3: 5 seconds

settings.name: Debounce Ticks
settings.description: Optionally debounce button presses (disable by default). A value of 4 is a good starting point if you have issues with multiple button presses firing.
